mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vocabulary ( word, meaning, synonyms, example, created_at, updated_at, del_flg, version_no ) VALUES ( #{word}, #{meaning}, #{synonyms}, #{example}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{delFlg}, #{versionNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE vocabulary SET word = #{word}, meaning = #{meaning}, synonyms = #{synonyms}, example = #{example}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, version_no = version_no + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flg = 0
UPDATE vocabulary SET del_flg = 1, deleted_at = #{deletedAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flg = 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vocabulary WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flg = 0

SELECT WORD_ID, WORD, MEANING, SYNONYMS, EXAMPLE, UPDATER, CREATOR, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DEL_FLG, VERSION_NO FROM VOCABULARIES WHERE CREATOR = #{creator, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DEL_FLG = ${@com.vn.toeic.common.Constant$DelFlg@NOT_DELETED} OFFSET #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT #{limit, jdbcType=INTEGER}
